# Clear Retro

> Real-time Agile Retrospective Tool for Developers

Clear Retro is a free, real-time collaboration tool designed for agile engineering teams to conduct sprint retrospectives. It offers a minimalist, distraction-free interface with features like anonymous feedback, voting, sorting, grouping, and action item tracking.

## Core Features
- **Real-time Collaboration**: Instantly see cards, votes, and timer updates.
- **Anonymous Feedback**: Encourage honest and open communication.
- **Customizable Boards**: Create boards with columns like Start/Stop/Continue, Mad/Sad/Glad, or custom themes.
- **Action Items**: Track follow-up tasks directly from the board.
- **Export**: detailed PDF and CSV reports.
- **AI-Powered**: Smart grouping and summaries to save time.
